description.en: The Labour Force Report presents the statistics of Malaysian hours worked obtained from the Labour Force Survey (LFS).
description.bm: Laporan Tenaga Buruh membentangkan statistik berkaitan jam bekerja Malaysia yang diperoleh daripada Survei Tenaga Buruh (STB).

variables.name: variable
variables.desc_en: [Categorical] Name of variable in snake case, representing industry as classified according to [MSIC 2008 - Malaysia Standard Industrial Classification 2008 Version 1.0](https://www.dosm.gov.my/v1/uploads/files/4_Portal%20Content/3_Methods%20%26%20Classifications/2_List%20of%20References/MSIC_2008.pdf)
variables.desc_bm: [Kategori] Nama pembolehubah dengan kes ular, mewakili industri seperti yang dikelaskan mengikut [MSIC 2008 - Piawaian Klasifikasi Industri Malaysia 2008 versi 1.0](https://www.dosm.gov.my/v1/uploads/files/4_Portal%20Content/3_Methods%20%26%20Classifications/2_List%20of%20References/MSIC_2008.pdf)

variables.name: variable_en
variables.desc_en: [Categorical] Full specification of the variable (English translation)

variables.name: variable_bm
variables.desc_en: [Categorical] Full specification of the variable (Malay translation)

variables.name: mean
variables.title_en: Time series: Mean hours worked by Industry
variables.title_bm: Siri masa: Jam berkerja Purata mengikut Industri

variables.name: median
variables.title_en: Time series: Median hours worked by Industry
variables.title_bm: Siri masa: Jam berkerja Penengah mengikut Industri

en.methodology: The Salaries & Wages Survey collects data via a stratified two-stage sample design, thus obtaining representative data at the national and state level. The implementation of this survey is based on guidelines and recommendations of the International Labour Organization (ILO) with reference to An Integrated System of Wages Statistics. For more details on the survey design and scope, please refer to the Technical Notes in the [latest Salaries & Wages Survey Report](https://storage.googleapis.com/dosm-public-publications/annual_2021_salaries_wages.pdf).
en.caveat: The primary aim of the survey is to produce statistics on monthly wage and salary recipients. Accordingly, the data does not cover all individuals classified as 'employed' in the Labour Force Survey - the primary categories excluded are employers, own-account workers, and unpaid family workers. Furthermore, except for the data broken down by ethnicity, all data is for Malaysian citizens only.
en.publication: [Salaries & Wages Survey Report, 2021](https://www.dosm.gov.my/v1/index.php?r=column/cthemeByCat&cat=157&bul_id=SzNvU0ZhaGpCMUROVlpCdTU1WWJSdz09&menu_id=Tm8zcnRjdVRNWWlpWjRlbmtlaDk1UT09), the latest edition of the annual salaries and wages data published by DOSM.

bm.methodology: Survei Gaji dan Upah menggunakan reka bentuk pensampelan berstrata dua peringkat, maka dapat menghasilkan statistik gaji & upah yang tepat di peringkat nasional dan negeri serta kawasan bandar dan luar bandar. Survei ini dilaksanakan berdasarkan garis panduan dan syor International Labour Organization (ILO) dengan merujuk kepada An Integrated System of Wages Statistics. Untuk huraian lanjut tentang reka bentuk dan skop survei, sila rujuk pada Nota Teknikal dalam [Laporan Survei Gaji dan Upah terkini](https://storage.googleapis.com/dosm-public-publications/annual_2021_salaries_wages.pdf).
bm.caveat: Tujuan utama survei ini adalah untuk menghasilkan statistikan tentang penerima gaji dan upah bulanan. Oleh itu, data tidak merangkumi kesemua individu yang dikelaskan sebagai 'bekerja' dalam Survei Tenaga Buruh - kategori utama yang dikecualikan adalah majikan, golongan yang bekerja sendiri, serta pekerja keluarga tanpa gaji. Tambahan lagi, kecuali dalam data mengikut etnik, semua data yang dipaparkan adalah untuk warganegara sahaja.
bm.publication: [Laporan Survei Gaji dan Upah, 2021](https://www.dosm.gov.my/v1/index.php?r=column/cthemeByCat&cat=157&bul_id=SzNvU0ZhaGpCMUROVlpCdTU1WWJSdz09&menu_id=Tm8zcnRjdVRNWWlpWjRlbmtlaDk1UT09),edisi terkini bagi statistik gaji dan upah tahunan yang diterbitkan oleh DOSM.
